member.name: T:Soda_application.Soda_app
member.summary: The interface part where the user interacts.

member.name: T:Soda_application.Cart
member.summary: Creates and stores the shopping cart of user. Also contains the method to change in the cart.

member.name: M:Soda_application.Cart.add_to_cart(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds Soda to cart. Also adds the cost

member.name: M:Soda_application.Cart.total_cost_of_cart
member.summary: Prints out the total cost of the cart.

member.name: M:Soda_application.Cart.input_drinks_to_list
member.summary: Adds all the drinks in the selection.

member.name: M:Soda_application.Cart.out_put_drinks
member.summary: Prints out all the drinks in list sodas.
